info.task: navigate backwards to collapsed accordion header
info.title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed accordion header in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondAccordionHeaderAndCollapseFirstAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: collapses the 'Personal Information' accordion header, and sets focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header

user: With focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
